name: Spinball: Spiral Out Of Control
description:
When the world finds itself in peril, the new sport Spinball stops the apocalypse and saves the day. Now, it is a spectator sport adored by all!

This is a two player local multiplayer game where players called Radians fight to keep their Quantum Gyroblades in stage as long as possible, while knocking their opponents out. 

Made for 2018-2019 Fall Proto Game Jam at UCI.

Omega Mode activated by typing "omega" into the password.
